description: Demolition of the existing building and construction of a new building of basement, ground and part 9, part 11 storeys plus plant comprising 165 residential units with associated residential facilities and 658sq.m. of retail / cafe and restaurant (A1-A4) use at ground floor, creation of vehicular access point from Lower Thames Street, works of hard and soft landscaping and ancillary works (total area 26,030sq.m. GEA).
